divs: sighting detailswas outside and looking up at the stars i noticed something that looked like a star was actually moving from north\east to south\west. there were no blinking lights that i could see, and the object was going in a straight line but kind of slithering in a right left motion. about 10 to 15 seconds after the object moved overhead, i saw a burst of light that went from west to east (the objest going north to south)that burst lasted about 3 seconds. i followed the object as far as i could see it then it faded out of sight. it did not go out of sight like a plane would, it just seemed to fade. the sky was very clear and i could see the big and litter dipper's. i have reported to you several times about seeing objects, but i still get kind of excited when i see a new one.
Summary: Witnessed an object crossing the night sky
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Bay Shore
There were no other sightings in Bay Shore on or around October 31st 2008
